job description:
Robert Half is immediately interviewing for a Data Scientist with 2+ years' experience in programming languages such as R or Python. This individual must have strong analytic skills, be able to perform quantitative analysis', and previous experience building statistical models.

This is a brand new position to the Franklin, TN based company and is looking for a Data Scientist that is proficient in various data science tool kits, data visualization tools, and query languages.

The Data Scientist opportunity is direct hire, full-time, full-benefits including M/D/V/401K w. match, PTO and extremely competitive salary based on years of experience.

If interested in lining up a first round phone screen please send updated resumes directly to jennifer.gordinier@rht.com.
